Sentencas: Using the sol gel method, we will incorporate Bi, Sr and Ba in site A into the LaMnO3 matrix to get La0.4Bi0.3Sr0.2Ba0.1MnO3 compound.
Titulo: Study of electrical properties and conduction mechanisms in La0.4Bi0.3Sr0.2Ba0.1MnO3 Ceramic elaborated by sol gel method

Sentencas: Our aim is to explore the structural and the electrical properties of this compound.
Titulo: Study of electrical properties and conduction mechanisms in La0.4Bi0.3Sr0.2Ba0.1MnO3 Ceramic elaborated by sol gel method

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction study indicates that the investigated compound exhibits a rhombohedral crystalline phase with R (3) over barc space symmetry.
Titulo: Study of electrical properties and conduction mechanisms in La0.4Bi0.3Sr0.2Ba0.1MnO3 Ceramic elaborated by sol gel method

Sentencas: Temperature dependence of the electrical conductivity in-dicates that the investigated sample exhibits a semiconductor behavior in the explored temperature range [80-400 K].
Titulo: Study of electrical properties and conduction mechanisms in La0.4Bi0.3Sr0.2Ba0.1MnO3 Ceramic elaborated by sol gel method

Sentencas: Then a saturation region appears at ambient temperature.
Titulo: Study of electrical properties and conduction mechanisms in La0.4Bi0.3Sr0.2Ba0.1MnO3 Ceramic elaborated by sol gel method

Sentencas: For ac-conductivity, the spectra obey to the double Jonscher response in the temperature range [80-135 K], the single Jonscher power law for [140-210 K] and to the classical Drude model for [220-400 K].
Titulo: Study of electrical properties and conduction mechanisms in La0.4Bi0.3Sr0.2Ba0.1MnO3 Ceramic elaborated by sol gel method

Sentencas: At elevated temperatures, the conduction is governed by the thermally activated hopping of small polaron (SPH).
Titulo: Study of electrical properties and conduction mechanisms in La0.4Bi0.3Sr0.2Ba0.1MnO3 Ceramic elaborated by sol gel method

Sentencas: However, the most appropriate conduction mechanism at low temperatures is the Variable Range Hopping process (VRH).
Titulo: Study of electrical properties and conduction mechanisms in La0.4Bi0.3Sr0.2Ba0.1MnO3 Ceramic elaborated by sol gel method

Sentencas: In the inter-mediate temperature range, the transport properties are described by Greaves variable range hopping model.
Titulo: Study of electrical properties and conduction mechanisms in La0.4Bi0.3Sr0.2Ba0.1MnO3 Ceramic elaborated by sol gel method

Sentencas: Then, the correlated barrier hopping (CBH) and the Jump relaxation Model (JRM) were used to explain the dispersion region.
Titulo: Study of electrical properties and conduction mechanisms in La0.4Bi0.3Sr0.2Ba0.1MnO3 Ceramic elaborated by sol gel method

Sentencas: Moreover, the value of the extracted activation energies is strongly dependent on frequency suggesting that the hopping mechanism is the dominant conduction process.
Titulo: Study of electrical properties and conduction mechanisms in La0.4Bi0.3Sr0.2Ba0.1MnO3 Ceramic elaborated by sol gel method

Sentencas: Also, the dis-order energy decreases with increasing frequency indicating that the separation path between jump centers is modified.
Titulo: Study of electrical properties and conduction mechanisms in La0.4Bi0.3Sr0.2Ba0.1MnO3 Ceramic elaborated by sol gel method

Sentencas: Indeed, the contribution of various processes to the conductivity makes our system as good candidate in the solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) applications.
Titulo: Study of electrical properties and conduction mechanisms in La0.4Bi0.3Sr0.2Ba0.1MnO3 Ceramic elaborated by sol gel method
